# cook your code here
t=int(raw_input())
for x in range(t):
    n=int(raw_input())
    d=dict()
    l=map(int,raw_input().split())
    for temp in l:
        if(temp in d.keys()):
            d[temp]+=1
        else:
            d[temp]=1
    m=d.keys()[0]
    m_c=d[d.keys()[0]]
    for k in d.keys():
        if((d[k]>m_c) or (d[k]==m_c and k<m)):
            m=k
            m_c=d[k]
    print str(m)+" "+str(m_c)
